name: Survive Lviv
description:
PREQUEL TO COMMIE KILLER 2069

Survive Lviv is an old school FPS where you need to survive a horde of Soviet robots, ghouls, and wizards in order to eliminate the Soviet overlord. The game takes place in a post nuclear Ukraine in the year 1991.

New character creation featuring the customization of your race, weapon, and name for your red blooded patriotic commie killer.


Will you be able to take out the man himself or will you melt like the snowflake you are....



--------------------------------------------------
Controls are as follows:
W: move forward
S: move backward
A: turn left
D: turn right
Left Mouse: fire
ESC: exit game
